title: I think some old models of champions in league of legends need to be updated
body: See, Lee sin, Amumu, Ezreal, Avinia, and irelia's old model shoud be updated, Riot can you hear me !!1??? I am begging you, irelia is my bias , adn i really want her skins and basic model get updated, please? Appreciate_********_

replies.body:
League of Legends is almost 8 years old now. There are definitely a lot of aspects that are relatively dated (we only just started rolling out updated client tech globally).

We do spend time revisiting and reviewing champions that are in dire need of updates. You can check out what we have done and whats coming up here - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule

Hi MARAUDARU, can i ask that when will the next new champion be released on the PBE server and the role of him/her/it? is he/she/it a mage champion? And when will the next region background lore updated right after the ionia updated.

Sorry =D we have teams working extremely hard on upcoming champions and skins. They have dedicated plans for champion teasers and releases that really try to give you (our players) the most enjoyment. It would be best for you to wait till official teasers and announce, I wouldn't want to take away from the hard work our team is doing by spoiling upcoming content.

1: It has been past 2 month nearly, when will the new champion's teaser be released? i believe it is a MAGE role. And also, i really want to know the in-game model of riven and yasuo's   new skin. i cannot wait and i dun want to wait anymore, i have waited enough riot. to be honest The only thing that keeps me playing league is new champions but riot just cannot make some champions which can really draw my attention that make me have a feeling that i would definitely main it/her/she once she/he/it is released. Hoping riot can make a new champion which is fun enough that keeps me want to play this game. or maybe i may just feel disappointed.(The past few champions are just not my style i like mage and fighter champions more and they must look cool enough and they have op abilities and kit.etc.)

2: The icon of items                                                   in league really should be updated as they look very old, so can Riot just make effort on doing that? I guess your company has grown to a bigger company which can handle this kind of thing and technology after nearly 10 years development, right?

3: Seriously, when can be more outdated champions reworked within a year like between 6 and 10 maybe?(                     ), i really want to know how long should it takes to totally rework an outdated champion and can Riot just post a list which tells us the rework champions list in the next few years so i can expect something instead of knowing nothing and this feels bad man, i do not like this feeling.

4: The icon of in-game mouse which mean the mouse you control in summoner's Rift, to be honest Riot, it looks outdated as well, maybe you guys can updated the in-game mouse sometime so these can make this game looks beautiful and fastidiousness?

Does Riot ever thinking about making new PROJECT skins plan? I think Irelia could get one them skin like project she really fits this them.(Irelia is my bias and i have been playing her for almost 4 years); And do you have any plans on reworking champions right after Urgot and Evelynn? Thank you for your time!!
Very appreciate for replying me and ok i will wait till the new content released.
